presets.name: Sea Surface Temperature
presets.expression: IR11=({10.5um}, brightness_temperature, 269.15, 309.15);IR12=({12um}, brightness_temperature, 269.15, 309.15);lm=equp(maps/landmask.png);bm=equp(maps/nasa_hd.jpg);lut=lut(lut/cal/SST_-4+36.png);lm(0) == 0 ? (IR11-IR12 > 0.09 ? 1 : (IR11 < 0.25 ? 1 : lut(IR11, 0, 0))) : bm(0),lm(0) == 0 ? (IR11-IR12 > 0.09 ? 1 : (IR11 < 0.25 ? 1 : lut(IR11, 0, 1))) : bm(1),lm(0) == 0 ? (IR11-IR12 > 0.09 ? 1 : (IR11 < 0.25 ? 1 : lut(IR11, 0, 2))) : bm(2)
